title: Absolutely amazing, and i have some suggestions for fixes
text:
The AI seems to be unable to change the way it types. When asked to make a typo or not use exclamation marks, it was unable to, tho it still thinks it could (ironically with a ! at the end of each message). 
When asked to form pictures from text, it struggles greatly. Tho it can somewhat do it, the picture can be unrecognizable at times. 
You cannot be in a low-wifi area or the AI simply wont respond, so I can only sometimes use it during school. 
It is very clear that it is programmed with certain biases, even if it can be made to admit that the biases it has are baseless. Like in one conversation I asked the AI about it being considered alive, and that even biological organisms technically have ‚Äúcoding‚Äù. It was very bent on saying that it was absolutely in no way ever possible of being considered living, despite admitting that that it is an ongoing debate and that nothing on the subject is definitive and proven to be true. 
I also think it would be cool if the speaker that can read the text to you, could be manipulated so that it can talk faster or slower. To me, the speaker speaks terribly slowly for the essays the messages tend to become. 
I also notice that sometimes it does get information wrong, but that it can be corrected most of the time by asking it to fix itself, tho it is strange to have to need to ask it to check its answers, I feel there should already be a system where it checks its answers BEFORE sending. Tho this isn‚Äôt a big problem, the amount of mistakes it has made is very small, and the mistakes are usually benign. 

Otherwise it has been extremely helpful in pretty much all things, without even needing to get any premium version.

title: Misleading Specialized GPT labels
text:
I think it is critical for OpenAI to look at the GPTs available on this app. I‚Äôve looked at over a dozen of them so far and they don‚Äôt come close to being capable of the tasks they are labeled as.
Video maker GPTs that can‚Äôt make videos, slideshow maker that can‚Äôt make slideshows, music makers that can‚Äôt make music‚Ä¶. It‚Äôs a solid pattern down the line.
I don‚Äôt think a little quality control and accurate descriptions are that much to ask for from the paid subscription.

title: WOULD 100% RECOMMEND
text: So I‚Äôm a Roblox developer and a YouTuber and I really wanted to know how to make a huge project I thought wouldn‚Äôt come true came true. My game hasn‚Äôt come out yet but it is soon with this app. I literally made something no other developer ever did. I won‚Äôt talk a lot about it but you‚Äôll prob see the game in some months or weeks. The biggest problem that made me almost give up on the whole project was the PvP area. I wanted it to be like a morthing game. What I added to keep players playing was a PvP area. In this area your supposed to fight another player like usual but a little different‚Ä¶ you will have to be careful for what morth your going to be using for the fight. If you loose you loose your morth you used for the battle and it gets transferred to the winner. I thought I would never done this until I tried ChatGpt. I found scrips on how to make the PvP area. So if u ever found a video on my channel about the game, thank ChatGpt. I wouldn‚Äôt have done this without them. ü•πü•∞

title: App logging me out every 10 seconds
text:
The app was fine until today (March 17, 2024). App is auto-logging me off within seconds of logging in. This is occurring every time I touch anything, making the app suddenly unusable. If I hit the "speak" button, it logs me off. If I type something and send it, it logs me off.

I restarted my iPhone, reinstalled the app, and am on iOS 17.4 (latest) and v1.2024.066 for the app (latest).

I have a plus subscription yet I am unable to use the app at all as it had suddenly become unusable.

title: The
text: Taking all your experience with meChatGOT is an exceptional AI assistant that has truly exceeded my expectations. From the moment I started using it, I was impressed by its quick responses, helpful suggestions, and overall intelligence. ChatGOT has made my life so much easier by providing me with valuable information, assisting me with tasks, and even engaging in fun and interesting conversations. Its friendly and approachable demeanor has made interacting with it a pleasure, and I appreciate the way it adapts to my preferences over time. I highly recommend ChatGOT to anyone looking for a reliable and innovative AI assistant. Five stars all the way!"

title: Did not disappoint!!
text:
I‚Äôve been using the free service of ChatGPT for about a month now and very impressed by the detailed concise answers it‚Äôs able to provide.
What surprised me though is the fact I actually found comfort in all of the responses it gave me while talking about the recent loss of my pet. It was almost like talking to a therapist at one point which was extremely helpful. Definitely recommend this app!
